template.template_analysis: The faangpath_simple template is structured for a clean and professional look suitable for technical roles. It provides a clear layout for showcasing skills and experiences. It can be further customized to highlight specific technical proficiencies and achievements.
template.customization_options: Customization options include adjusting the color scheme, font styles, and section headings to align with the candidate's preferences. Adding a skills matrix or a project showcase section can enhance the presentation of technical skills.

detected_fields.ai_field_analysis: Utilize the 'name' command to replace 'Your name' placeholder with the candidate's actual name. Ensure proper formatting of the 'address' command for accurate contact information display.

candidate_data.name: Maciej Kasik
candidate_data.profile_summary: Motivated Computer Science graduate with a strong foundation in programming and problem-solving, seeking to leverage hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, ETL, and data pipeline design as a Cloud Data Engineer at IPF Digital.

Education requirements.field: Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field

Key responsibilities: Designing, developing, and maintaining secure and scalable data pipelines
Migrating SQL Server to Snowflake on AWS Cloud
Implementing medallion architecture (bronze, silver, and gold layers)
Company values/culture mentions: Building a better world through financial inclusion
Certifications or qualifications: Certifications in Snowflake, AWS, or other cloud platforms
Exact phrases for CV: Hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, ETL, and data pipeline design
Proven success in migrating SQL Server to the cloud, ensuring data integrity and performance
Skilled in bronze, silver, and gold layers, ensuring data reliability, scalability, and accessibility
Experience in query optimization, data modeling, and system performance tuning
Knowledge of encryption, access control, and regulatory compliance for cloud-based systems
Ability to translate technical concepts into business insights, working effectively with architects, analysts, and leadership
Anticipates challenges, removes obstacles, and creates scalable long-term solutions

strengths.Technical Skills: Candidate possesses intermediate proficiency in Snowflake, SQL, and AWS, matching the required technical skills.
strengths.Experience Level: Candidate's Master's degree and technical skills align with the senior-level experience required.
strengths.Responsibilities Alignment: Candidate's profile summary reflects hands-on experience relevant to key responsibilities like data pipeline design and system performance tuning.

weaknesses.Experience Years: Candidate may need to demonstrate additional years of experience to meet the required +5 years.
weaknesses.Preferred Skills: Candidate lacks explicit mention of ETL skills, a preferred technical skill for the role.

improvement_suggestions.Experience Demonstration: Highlight any relevant projects or internships to showcase practical experience beyond academic qualifications.
improvement_suggestions.ETL Skills: Consider gaining exposure to ETL tools or projects to enhance this aspect of your profile.

job_analysis.template_specific_recommendations: Utilize the 'Skills' section in the template to emphasize hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, and data pipeline design. Consider adding a 'Projects' section to showcase practical applications of technical skills and highlight problem-solving abilities.
